description: Entity definition, metadata, and security container.

disabled_versions.description: Collection of disabled entity versions. The runtime will not permit disabled entity versions to be executed.

groups.description: Mapping maintaining the set of URefs associated with each "user group". This can be used to control access to methods in a particular version of the entity. A method is callable by any context which "knows" any of the URefs associated with the method's user group.

lock_status.description: A flag that determines whether a entity is locked
